products.name: Brooks Addiction Walker 2 (Black/Black) Men's Walking Shoes
products.brandedName: Brooks Addiction Walker 2 (Black/Black) Men's Walking Shoes
products.description: ; The Brooks Addiction Walker 2 shoes have a freshly updated leather upper with a roomier fit that still provides maximum support for your low arches and control for your overpronation. This modern walking shoe is ideal for both long and casual walks and will keep you feeling great whenever and wherever your day takes you! Supple leather upper. Traditional lace-up style for a preferred fit. Breathable mesh lining for a more comfortable interior fit. Removable insole is lightweight and provides excellent underfoot cushioning and support for all-day comfort. Features a flat-to-medium arch in the insole area for added support. BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning provides ideal underfoot softness and support while still providing excellent responsiveness and durability. Extended Progressive Diagonal Rollbar (PDRB) presents a robust, dual density post at the medial arch allowing for progressive pronation control. Engineered MC Pod Configuration enables the midsole and outsole to set the foot up in an efficient and balanced position offering maximum motion control and flexibility from heel strike through toe-off. Updated outsole certified slip resistant (SATRA TM144:2011). Differential: 12mm APMA Approved : The American Podiatric Medical Association Seal of Acceptance is awarded to products that promote good foot health and are substantiated by a committee of discerning podiatrists by wear-testing and review of the application and supporting documentation. APMA Acceptance must be applied for and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. PDAC A5500 Approved: Pricing, Data Analysis and Coding A5500 Diabetic Medicare Coding is awarded to footwear that is available in three or more widths, with a removable insole (sock-liner). These attributes may allow a footwear style to be deemed an extra-depth shoe. It also allows individuals to pay for their footwear through their Medicare. PDAC must be applied for on a yearly basis and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. For more specific info, visit the Medicare website or call 1-800-MEDICARE. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 10, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.name: MAD Paris Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black
products.brandedName: MAD Paris Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black
products.unbrandedName: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black
products.description: MAD Paris Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black ROYAL OAK SELFWINDING CHRONOGRAPH: Rugged elegance and a sharp dial design in a stainless steel timepiece with blue duo-toned Grande Tapisserie dial and oversized chronograph counters at 9 o'clock and 3 o'clock.. Case: 41mm Stainless steel case, glareproofed sapphire crystal, screw-locked crown. Dial: Blue dial with Grande Tapisserie pattern, rhodium-toned counters, white gold applied hour-markers and Royal Oak hands with luminescent coating. Bracelet: Steel - DLC Coated with AP folding clasp. Water Resistance: 50m. Serial/Year: LG5387Y 2022 MAD Paris Box provided. Like New. MDPF-ML3. LG5387Y. About the designer:
products.aiDescription: Introducing the MAD Paris Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black, a high-end men's watch that exudes rugged elegance. This stainless steel timepiece features a striking blue duo-toned Grande Tapisserie dial and oversized chronograph counters at 9 o'clock and 3 o'clock. With a 41mm case, glareproofed sapphire crystal, and screw-locked crown, this watch is both durable and stylish. The blue dial is adorned with rhodium-toned counters, white gold applied hour-markers, and luminescent Royal Oak hands. The steel bracelet is DLC coated and comes with an AP folding clasp. Water-resistant up to 50m, this watch is perfect for any occasion. It comes with a MAD Paris box and is in unworn, like-new condition. Elevate your style with the MAD Paris Audemars Piguet Royal Oak Chrono in Black. Get yours now at FWRD.

products.description: How to choose your size. Our sizing buttons list the Men's size first (M) and the equivalent Women's size second (W) Ex. These slides are made with renewable and natural materials as part of the commitment by adidas to help end plastic waste. EVA sole is made with around 17% plant-based content. Product Features: Design inspired by 3D topography and human expeditions to Mars for a futuristic twist. Slip-on slide sandal silhouette with a fixed upper band. Bio-based outsole made with plant-based material. adidas Originals branding for style. Grippy traction pattern on the sole. Theadidas Originals adilette 22 Slide Sandals are imported. The iconic adilette slide is back and better than ever, with a sustainable material upgrade and bold new styling. Futuristic design details level up the classic silhouette, while the plush EVA outsole is made with around 17% plant-based content derived from sugarcane.

products.name: SAVILE ROW CO Bi-Stretch Solid 2-Piece Suit
products.brandedName: SAVILE ROW CO Bi-Stretch Solid 2-Piece Suit
products.unbrandedName: SAVILE ROW CO Bi-Stretch Solid 2-Piece Suit
products.description: Upgrade your wardrobe with this solid suit including a two-button front, notch lapel jacket and trouser pants for contemporary style. Blazer: 29'' length (size 40S); Pant: 9 1/2'' rise, 30'' inseam (size 34W) 2-piece set Jacket: notch lapel, long sleeves with button cuffs, two-button front closure, chest welt pocket, front flap pockets, lined Pants: zipper fly, belt loops, pockets Shell: 76% polyester, 20% rayon, 4% spandex; Lining: 100% polyester Dry clean Imported Model stats: 6'1" height, 32" waist. Model is wearing size 34W.
products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and modern suit to add to your wardrobe? Look no further than the SAVILE ROW CO Bi-Stretch Solid 2-Piece Suit from Nordstrom Rack. This men's suit set includes a two-button front blazer with a notch lapel and long sleeves with button cuffs, as well as trouser pants with a zipper fly and belt loops. The blazer features a chest welt pocket and front flap pockets, while the pants have pockets for added convenience. Made from a blend of polyester, rayon, and spandex, this suit is both comfortable and durable. Upgrade your wardrobe with this sleek and sophisticated set today!

products.description: SAINT LAURENTâ€™s slim jacket riffs on denim trucker styles, from its front seams to the classic chest pockets, but is crafted from butter-soft leather. It's really versatile, so you'll be able to wear it under a wool coat or with a tee and jeans to a gig. Small to size. See Size & Fit notes.
products.aiDescription: Looking for a stylish and versatile leather jacket? Look no further than the SAINT LAURENT Slim-Fit Leather Trucker Jacket, available at MR PORTER. This jacket is perfect for men who want to add a touch of edge to their wardrobe. Crafted from butter-soft leather, it features front seams and classic chest pockets, reminiscent of denim trucker styles. Wear it under a wool coat or with a tee and jeans for a cool and casual look. Note that this jacket runs small, so be sure to check the Size & Fit notes before purchasing.

products.name: Signature Cashmere Polo Sweater
products.brandedName: Naadam Signature Cashmere Polo Sweater
products.description: The Cashmere Polo Sweater is a timeless knit with a relaxed classic fit and short classic length designed to skim the top of the hip bones. It features a relaxed point collar, v neckline, and ribbed details. Crafted from 100% premium, sustainable cashmere.
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Cashmere Polo Sweater by Naadam. This women's polo shirt is the epitome of effortless style. With its cropped v-neck design and relaxed point collar, it exudes a cool-girl attitude. Made from luxurious cashmere, it adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. Whether paired with jeans, skirts, or trousers, this sweater is the perfect choice for those who want to look expensive without trying too hard. Elevate your wardrobe with this polished and versatile piece from NAADAM.

products.name: Slim Baird McNutt garment-dyed Irish linen shirt
products.brandedName: J.Crew Slim Baird McNutt garment-dyed Irish linen shirt
products.unbrandedName: Slim Baird McNutt garment-dyed Irish linen shirt
products.description: We sourced our linen from Ireland's Baird McNutt mill (Irish linen is considered to be the world's finest, and Baird McNutt's, the finest in Ireland) and it has an incredible softness, thanks to a weaving process that the mill has been perfecting since 1912. It's what makes this shirt a summer essential for when you need to stay cool and look polished but not too polishedâ€”linen wrinkles easily and actually looks best with a few creases. A tailored fit, cut slim through the body and sleeves.
products.aiDescription: This J.Crew Slim Baird McNutt garment-dyed Irish linen shirt is a must-have for any stylish man's summer wardrobe. Made from the world's finest Irish linen sourced from Baird McNutt mill, this shirt is incredibly soft and perfect for staying cool in the heat. The weaving process used by the mill since 1912 ensures the shirt's quality and durability. The shirt's relaxed yet polished look is perfect for any occasion, and the linen's natural tendency to wrinkle adds to its charm. Don't miss out on this essential piece of menswear.
